title: Portfolio 2020
desc: Current version of the portfolio uses React/Webpack for front-end server and Express for back-end API request.

title: Blow Your Mind
desc: This was a final group project for Code Fellows 201.  I was responsible for creating all art assets, CSS styling / animation, and core game mechanics.

title: Gallery of Horns
desc: A gallery app made using ES6, handlebars, jQuery.  It utilizes json files to populate gallery items.

title: Book App
desc: This is a web app that allows users to query Google Book API and store / edit their favorite entries into postgres database using SQL.

title: Bus Mall
desc: This small app takes user inputs and display the data as chart.

title: KEXP Clash Day 2019
desc: This is a single page application for client KEXP.  I was responsible for CSS layout and responsive styling

title: KEXP Annual Report 2017
desc: Annual report site for client KEXP.  I was responsible for all styling and functionalities in programming highlight page

title: Publicis Website
desc: Wordpress customization and maintenance for my previous company website.
